statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -4 \\ -9 \\ 21 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
